title: Great 1 Studio Bed / 1 Bath unit near Microsoft
posting_body: ['Looking for a tenant to rent a room in our home (has a separate entrance).', '1 bed / 1 bath furnished studio mother-in-law type unit with a separate entrance full bath and a kitchenet.', 'Room has: Queen Bed, Desk, Dresser, Nightstand, Shelves, Small LCD TV (will need to connect to service) Small fridge, Microwave, Heating plate, Air Heater.', "Some of the photos show previous tenant's stuff that is no longer there.", 'What you do not need can be removed (Except for the bed).', 'Available September 1 2022', 'Location: 5 min drive to Microsoft main campus.', '2 min drive to Idylwood park and 5 minutes to  Marymoor park.', '$1,400 / month + $50 Utilities (power/water/garbage)', 'Minimum 6 Month lease', '$1400 Security Deposit', 'First and Last month rent prior to move in.', 'Will need to have a minimum Credit Score of 670.', 'You pay application fee directly to online screening service.', 'Need to show minimum of 1 year of consistent income source.', 'No Pets.', 'House is at a cul-de-sac parking available at the street.', 'There is a shared wall with our house with our kids so you can expect some minor noise occasionally.', 'No Smoking of any kind in or near the house.', 'No loud music or loud noise.', ' No overnight guests unless received permission in writing.', 'Please tell us about yourself.']
